structure.unit: OFFENSES AGAINST THE STATE AND PUBLIC JUSTICE

law.catch_line: Evidence in contempt trial by jury.
law.text: In all trials by jury arising under KRS 432.230 to 432.280, the truth of the matter may be given in evidence.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 1292.
